name: Bullet Hell Prototype (CNico)
description:
Download the standard build (PC-Standard-Build) for extended features (Selectable Language)

Code Available: https://github.com/NicolasCastagnola/Unity-Bullet-Hell-Solid

## Structural Patterns:

- Composite

- Decorator

- Facade

- Flyweight

## Behavioral Patterns:

- Memento

- Command

- Observer

- Strategy

## Creational Patterns:

- Abstract Factory

- Factory Method

- Builder

- Prototype

- Singleton

## Other Patterns:

- Model-View-Controller (MVC)

- Localization Manager

- Event Manager

- Look-Up-Table

- Object Pool
